decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1170/1011, Unnumbered location plan, Unnumbered block plan. Received: 15/09/2014. Q-2464-1 Rev. B. Received: 03/11/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No air conditioning condenser units shall be operated on the premises before 08:00am or after 18:00pm Monday to Sunday.
Condition : 4 - The level of noise emitted from the site shall not exceed 53dba at any time and shall be maintained as to not exceed these levels.
description: Installation of six condensor units to the rear at first floor level
